reviewText: yes, this is Euro standard, PAL, but if you watch it on a computer all is good - send output picture to whatever screen you like, and that's it. Perfection in every way;  extends the life expectancy. would give it 6 stars, but no option for that. watch it live if and/or when you can, you'll understand and agree with me.
The DVD format does not allow it to play in the US.  I was not able to watch it at all.  Be careful if you are buying from the US.
